id.description: ID of the PPBC.PowerProfileDefinition. Must be unique in the scope of the Resource Manager, for at least the duration of the session between Resource Manager and CEM.

start_time.description: Indicates the first possible time the first PPBC.PowerSequence could start

end_time.description: Indicates when the last PPBC.PowerSequence shall be finished at the latest

power_sequences_containers.description: The PPBC.PowerSequenceContainers that make up this PPBC.PowerProfileDefinition. There shall be at least one PPBC.PowerSequenceContainer that includes at least one PPBC.PowerSequence. PPBC.PowerSequenceContainers must be placed in chronological order.
